body.name: Hamilton Beach 12 Cup Programmable Drip Coffee Maker with 3 Brew Options, Glass Carafe, Auto Pause and Pour, Black with Stainless Accents (46299)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 46 mins

features: PROGRAMMABLE FOR WAKE-UP READY COFFEE : Use Easy-Touch programming to set the 12 cup coffee maker up to 24 hours ahead so hot coffee is ready in the morning when you wake up to start your day.

GET YOUR FIRST CUP FAST WITH AUTO PAUSE & POUR: The Auto Pause & Pour feature on this drip coffee maker lets you get your first cup fast. It briefly delays the flow of coffee so you can sneak a cup before brewing ends without making a mess.

COFFEE YOUR WAY WITH SELECT-A-BREW: This Hamilton Beach coffee maker gives you 3 brew strength options. Select regular or bold strength, or 1-4 cups when you want to brew less coffee with optimal flavor.
2 HOUR AUTOMATIC SHUTOFF FOR PEACE OF MIND: The programmable coffee maker automatically turns off after 2 hours so you don't have to worry about whether or not you've left it on.
EASY TO CLEAN: The 12 cup borosilicate glass carafe and Lift & Clean brew basket are dishwasher safe, and the nonstick warming plate is nonstick and simple to wipe clean.
ELIMINATE TANGLES ON THE COUNTERTOP with convenient cord storage.
body.description: Skip the alarm and wake up to the aroma of freshly brewed coffee every morning The Hamilton Beach 12 Cup Programmable Coffee Maker can be programmed up to 24 hours in advance so you can make sure you never miss your coffee wake-up call Customize your cup with three brew options—regular bold or 1–4 cups And pour your first cup fast before the brewing process is done without compromising taste or creating a mess with the auto pause and serve feature The 2-hour automatic shutoff gives you peace of mind Cord storage eliminates tangles on the countertop Easy cleanup—carafe and brew basket are top-rack dishwasher safe hot plate is nonstick and easily wipes clean.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research and rigorous testing to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach Programmable Coffee Maker Skip the alarm and wake up to the aroma of freshly brewed coffee every morning. The Hamilton Beach 12 Cup Programmable Coffee Maker can be programmed up to 24 hours in advance, so you can make sure you never miss your coffee wake-up call. Customize your cup with three brew options—regular, bold, or 1–4 cups. And pour your first cup fast before the brewing process is done, without compromising taste or creating a mess, with the auto pause and serve feature. Wake-up ready coffee with Easy Touch programming Coffee your way with Select-a-Brew Auto Pause & Pour and 2-hour automatic shutoff Cord storage eliminates tangles on the countertop Carafe and brew basket are top-rack dishwasher safe; hot plate is nonstick and easily wipes clean

Features: Programmable to Fit Your Schedule The digital clock is easy to program and you can set your brew time up to 24 hours in advance for wake-up ready coffee. Easy to Clean The 12-cup borosilicate glass carafe and lift & clean brew basket are top-rack dishwasher safe; the hot plate is nonstick and easy to wipe clean. Auto-Shutoff With 2-hour automatic shutoff, you won’t have to wonder if you left the pot on.

Auto Pause & Pour Sneak a cup during the brewing process without any spilling. Select-a-Brew Prefer a robust brew? Or just want the right balance even when you’re making one serving? This coffee maker offers you the brewing customization you need—choose from bold, regular, or 1–4 cups. Easy-View Water Window The water reservoir is easy to fill and features a water window that lets you view the water level from the front of the brewer.

Programmable Coffee Maker Flexbrew 2-Way Brewer (12-Cup Carafe & Single Serve) FlexBrew Single-Serve Coffee Maker for K-Cups and Ground Coffee 12-Cup Programmable Brewstation Dispensing Coffee Machine Programmable ✓ ✓ ✓ Includes 12 Cup Coffee Carafe ✓ ✓ No Carafe Multi-Cup Dispensing ✓ Single Serve Brew With Ground Coffee or With K-Cups ✓ ✓ Espresso Compatible With Nespresso capsules & other brands Removable Water Reservoir ✓ Brew Strength Options 3 2 2 4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needed a new coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: This coffee maker is perfect for my countertop. It's easy to use, makes a pot of coffee in just a few minutes, and keeps it hot, right to the last cup. I like how it turns itself off after two hours. My only complaint is that the clock is not backlit, other than that, great purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Coffee Maker
reviews.reviewText: Works well and has a great price Hamilton Beach makes good appliances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Coffee Pot with a Couple of Convenient Features
reviews.reviewText: I've been the proud owner of this coffee pot for a year and a half now, and I'm delighted to share my thoughts on its performance. In a nutshell, it has proven to be a dependable companion, consistently delivering a great coffee experience without a hitch.What immediately stood out to me is the seamless functionality. From day one to today, I haven't encountered a single issue – a testament to its quality construction and design. The coffee pot's consistent performance has become an integral part of my daily routine, ensuring a fresh and satisfying brew each morning.One feature I particularly appreciate is the well-thought-out automatic shut-off timer. While at first, I wished the pot would remain on until manually turned off, I've come to realize the benefits of this two-hour timer. It's a great safety feature, especially for those moments when forgetfulness might strike. Besides, it's a gentle reminder that our busy lives sometimes need a nudge to ensure we don't accidentally leave appliances running.I must admit, though, there are times when I long for that extended brewing session. On occasions when I'd love to come back for second or even third cups a few hours later, the timer does have its limitations. However, looking at the bigger picture, this limitation is a small price to pay for the peace of mind and energy savings it provides.In conclusion, this coffee pot has proven its reliability time and time again. Its consistent performance and well-designed features make it a worthwhile addition to any coffee lover's kitchen. Whether you're seeking a hassle-free brewing experience or appreciate the safety of an automatic shut-off, this coffee pot strikes a balance that's hard to beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was almost cheaper to buy the whole unit instead of just the carafe.
reviews.reviewText: We had this same model, and the carafe broke. It was about the same money to buy a whole new coffee maker as it was to get a new carafe, so that's what we did. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Easy pouring into the tank.
reviews.reviewText: I researched and bought the four best-review brands I could find, at the same time so I could compare. The tank is as wide-open as I've ever seen, so that's great for fast pouring and for easy cleaning. Coffee is now noticeably smoother - maybe old one had too much build up, or it just does a great brewing job. It's much quieter than my old Black and Decker. The position and angle of the digital display makes it easy to read and use, although I wish it was a bit brighter, but that's okay! Carafe handle is comfy. Just for fun, I ordered a metal mesh filter basket and charcoal water filters from Amazon. Maybe the water filters will help reduce calcium build up and retain the smooth flavor. Great product for this price range!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, easy and tasty
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Hamilton Beach coffee maker. The first was the same model as this, and it lasted for years. I finally replaced it after the warming plate rusted. I really like the 1-4 cup feature, as I'm the only coffee drinker in my house. This coffee maker is a great value. Recommended by me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use and Makes an Excellent Cup of Coffee
reviews.reviewText: I bought this coffee maker because I wanted a reliable 12-cup coffee maker that was easy to clean, had a two hour automatic turnoff, and did not require programming. I have been using this coffee maker for over a week, and it is PERFECT! The pot has a slightly longer pour spout so when I fill the water reservoir it doesn't spill water on the counter top and it doesn't leak coffee when I fill my cup. If I forget to turn it off, it does so automatically after 2 hours. I can easily clean the water reservoir area (something I couldn't do with my previous Mr. Coffee Maker). I am extremely happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The "Auto Pause & Pour" feature delivers lukewarm coffee
reviews.reviewText: The claim: "The Auto Pause & Pour feature on this drip coffee maker lets you get your first cup fast. It briefly delays the flow of coffee so you can sneak a cup before brewing ends without making a mess."The problem: The coffee needs time in the carafe on the heated base ("warming plate") to reach a proper temperature. Pausing and pouring during the brew process gives you coffee that is tepid at best.
Funciona muy bien, es practicar de usar y el costo fue muy bueno

reviews.reviewTitle: Check the size of there unit.
reviews.reviewText: I like that I could get a white coffee maker, as my other small appliances are white. it is getting harder to fund white ones. The only thing that I was not expecting is the size of the coffee maker itself. It was a little bigger than I expected,, so it doesn't fit on my counter as well as my old one. It does make a GREAT cup of coffee first thing in the morning.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very affordable and so far reliable! Been using out of the box since June 8th.
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly. Makes coffee smoothly. And a huge fan of the auto brew feature.Not much extra bells and wisles otherwise but makes up for with a very affordable price while still brewing an excellent cup of Joe! Don't really need the extra features myself anyway.And don't see myself wanting to spend more on a machine when this works perfectly and has so far been reliable. I've been using it out of the box since June 8th, had to get a new one during lockdown I tend to pack a lot of grinds, and it still had yet to back up. Or include any errors. Something my old machine was prone to and was more expensive.Wouldn't have been able to survive going back to work after lockdown! And didn't have a huge budget at all, as I wasn't working. Also love having a brew auto timed for before I wake up! Very happy I stumbled upon this machine and I'm very satisfied with my purchase!
Excelente cafetera y a buen precio.
